Text: Survey of Alums for Texas Lutheran UniversityTexas Lutheran University has hired an independent market research firm Carnegie Communications to conduct a study of alumni perceptions and needs Your feedback on the short survey will be invaluable as the College continues its strategic planning process The link below will take you directly to the online survey Once there point and click your way through the questions and click on submit when done All who respond will be entered in a drawing to win a gift pack valued at from the TLU bookstore Thank you html pa hrefsmstlualumhtm wwwcarnegiecommcomsmstlualumhtmap html If this link is not active please copy and paste the URL into your Internet browser If you would prefer to receive a text version of this survey via email that you can complete and return in the mail reply to this message and well email one to you Sincerely Elizabeth K Scarborough Vice President Carnegie Communications
